title: Primer

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - At the beginning of each day and each night, your role will be changed to the next prime-numbered role in the GIM thread but you keep this attribute. At the start of Day 1, you'll become 173: Keymaster, and then so on.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Whatever your prime-numbered role's win condition is.

desc:
Post 167
*My favourite number is one nonillion, sixty-six quadrillion, six hundred trillion and one.*
